thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Hotel -
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: naj3
title: Excellent Hotel -
text: Stayed for 4 nights. Great location for all the main sites, close to Metro but we walked everywhere! We really couldn't fault any aspect, beautifully clean, breakfast very good and staff were helpful and attentive without exception which in our experience can be unusual for city centre hotels. We also had one meal at the Restaurant which was delicious. Highly recommended.
